formatted_address: 2 Tessensohn Rd, Level 1 Singapore Khalsa Association, Singapore 217646
name: Tashan Bar

reviews.text: Came here with my husband for their live band event and it was definitely the best decision! We were warmly greeted by the owner, Manjit Kaur, who is a sweetheart. The live band was awesome and the selection of songs was perfect. We ordered fish tikka, chicken tikka & seekh kebab, the food was super tasty and left us craving for more! Shared my experience with family & friends, and they can't wait to experience it themselves. Looking forward to the next trip! :))

I’m not one to review restaurants, but this is a very ambient and atmospheric environment. The chicken tikka is a must try, and if you have any drinks you’re considering to buy, the staff will offer you a sample to try. The drink prices are also affordable especially given the prime location. This restaurant is definitely worth your visit.

The food is great! They're actually very very reasonably priced. went there the other day with my buddies and got a bottle of Glenlivet 18 and fell in love with  the Lagavulin whiskey the bartenders let me try. Definitely a very underrated place. would 100% go back for their fresh naans.

Great vibes and a great place to hang out and chill with your friends.
Would 100 percent recommend to anyone that wants drinks.
The bartenders are also really nice and friendly.
met my friends for dinner at the bar, food was great and staff were warm and friendly!! highly recommended to anyone who would be interested in giving authentic Indian food a try (:

vicinity: 2 Tessensohn Road, Level 1 Singapore Khalsa Association
